name: Car Destroyer (1.0)
description:
Car Destroyer.

In this game, you will control a tank and you must destroy so many other cars as you can before they destroy you. 

this game is only the result of all my practices and learning in game development until now, you will notice several mechaniques like player movement, 3D phisics, enemy behaivour, camera control, and other details in the player control; if you shoot from the side, the shoot force will overturn you, but you will re-spawn in a few seconds.

Controls:

  • W, A, S, D  or KeyPad  to move.
  • Q and E for turn the cannon
  • Try a new way to play! Press 0 for first person mode.
  • SpaceBar for shoot.

Nice UI and Menu xD
